Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM root WHERE root["Flag"]
SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM root WHERE (NOT root["Flag"])
SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM root JOIN m0 IN root["Multiples"] WHERE ((m0 % 3) = 0)
SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM root WHERE root["Flag"]
SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM root WHERE (root["Number"] < -7)

Input.Description: Select number -> Count w/ operator filter

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM root WHERE (root["Number"] < -13)
SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE root["Int"] FROM root OFFSET 90 LIMIT 2147483647) AS r0
SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE root["Int"] FROM root OFFSET 90 LIMIT 5) AS r0
SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE root["Int"] FROM root OFFSET 5 LIMIT 5) AS r0

Input.Description: Skip -> Take -> SelectMany(Select) -> Skip -> Take -> Count

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE c0["Grade"] FROM ( SELECT VALUE root FROM root OFFSET 5 LIMIT 5) AS r0 JOIN c0 IN r0["Children"] OFFSET 10 LIMIT 20) AS r1

Input.Description: Skip -> Take -> Select(new(Skip -> Select -> Count, Skip -> Take -> Select -> Count, Take -> Skip -> Select -> Count) -> Skip -> Take)
Input.Expression: query.Skip(1).Take(20).Select(f => new AnonymousType(v0 = f.Children.Skip(1).Select(c => c.Grade).Count(), v1 = f.Children.Skip(1).Take(3).Select(c => c.Grade).Count(), v2 = f.Children.Take(3).Skip(1).Select(c => c.Grade).Count())).Skip(1).Take(10).Count(), Object)

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE r4 FROM ( SELECT VALUE {"v0": v4, "v1": v8, "v2": v12} FROM root JOIN ( SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE v2["Grade"] FROM root JOIN v2 IN root["Children"] OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2147483647) AS r0) AS v4 JOIN ( SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE v5["Grade"] FROM root JOIN v5 IN root["Children"] OFFSET 1 LIMIT 3) AS r1) AS v8 JOIN ( SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE r2["Grade"] FROM ( SELECT TOP 3 VALUE v9 FROM root JOIN v9 IN root["Children"]) AS r2 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2147483647) AS r3) AS v12 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 20) AS r4 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 10) AS r5

Input.Expression: query.Skip(1).Take(20).Select(f => new AnonymousType(v0 = f.Children.Skip(1).Count(c => (c.Grade > 50)), v1 = f.Children.Skip(1).Take(3).Count(c => (c.Grade > 50)), v2 = f.Children.Take(3).Skip(1).Count(c => (c.Grade > 50)), v3 = f.Records.Transactions.Select(t => t.Amount).OrderBy(a => a).Skip(10).Take(20).Count(), v4 = f.Children.Where(c => (c.Grade > 20)).OrderBy(c => c.Grade).Select(c => c.Grade).Skip(1).Count())).Skip(1).Take(10).Count(f => ((f.v0 + f.v1) > (f.v2 + f.v3))), Object)

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE r7 FROM ( SELECT VALUE {"v0": v4, "v1": v8, "v2": v12, "v3": v15, "v4": v17} FROM root JOIN ( SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE v2 FROM root JOIN v2 IN root["Children"] OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2147483647) AS r0 WHERE (r0["Grade"] > 50)) AS v4 JOIN ( SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE v5 FROM root JOIN v5 IN root["Children"] OFFSET 1 LIMIT 3) AS r1 WHERE (r1["Grade"] > 50)) AS v8 JOIN ( SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE r2 FROM ( SELECT TOP 3 VALUE v9 FROM root JOIN v9 IN root["Children"]) AS r2 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2147483647) AS r3 WHERE (r3["Grade"] > 50)) AS v12 JOIN ( SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE t0["Amount"] FROM root JOIN t0 IN root["Records"]["Transactions"] ORDER BY t0["Amount"] ASC OFFSET 10 LIMIT 20) AS r5) AS v15 JOIN ( SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE c0["Grade"] FROM root JOIN c0 IN root["Children"] WHERE (c0["Grade"] > 20) ORDER BY c0["Grade"] ASC OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2147483647) AS r6) AS v17 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 20) AS r7 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 10) AS r8 WHERE ((r8["v0"] + r8["v1"]) > (r8["v2"] + r8["v3"]))
